name: Best Ever Blueberry Cobbler
author: Jen
summary: This recipe works great with other cobbler fruit and is an excellent light dessert that isn't too sweet! Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In an 8 inch square baking dish, mix blueberries, 3 tablespoons sugar, and orange juice
In a small bowl, thoroughly mix flour, baking powder, and salt
In a medium bowl, cream butter and 1/2 cup sugar until light and fluffy
Beat in egg and vanilla extract
Gradually add flour mixture, stirring just until ingredients are combined
Drop batter by rounded tablespoons over blueberry mixture
Try to cover as much of filling as possible
Bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, until topping is golden brown and filling is bubbling
